diagrams.title: Socratic Method
diagrams.description: Make Claim → Ask Probing Questions → Reveal Contradictions → Refine Claim

diagrams.title: Ladder of Inference
diagrams.description: Data → Select Data → Interpret → Assume → Conclude → Believe → Act

diagrams.title: Hanlon's Razor
diagrams.description: Observe Negative Outcome → Question Malice → Default to Incompetence
